question: Before the formal inauguration of Odisha High Court, Odisha was under the jurisdiction of which among the following High Courts?
option3: Both Calcutta and Patna High Court
answer: Both Calcutta and Patna High Court
explanation: In the year 1912, Odisha was under the jurisdiction of Calcutta High Court and in the year 1916, Odisha was under the jurisdiction of Patna High Court.
